short_summary: Retender EW038-231922 - Qimugjuk Building Roof Repair
description: The work of this Contract comprises repair of existing skylights, roofing and cladding of the Iqaluit Government of Canada Building located in Iqaluit, Nunavut.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Repair Services for Qimugjuk Building Roof in Iqaluit

**Title:** Retender EW038-231922 - Qimugjuk Building Roof Repair

**Reference Number:** WS3912441146-Doc4041004722

**Publication Date:** June 5, 2023

**Closing Date:** July 18, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time

**Purchase Description:**
The original bid solicitation, dated March 11, 2023 (WS3912441146), has been cancelled and superseded. The new closing date for bid submissions is July 4, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time.

**Work Required:**
The work under this contract comprises the repair of existing skylights, roofing, and cladding of the Government of Canada Building located in Iqaluit, Nunavut.

**Submission Instructions:**
Bidders are required to submit all supporting documentation and bid submittals by the specified deadline to avoid non-responsiveness.

**Notice Type and Method:**
This is a Request for Proposal under competitive open bidding.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The contract award will be based on the Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price, with the highest rating being awarded.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Delivery Location:**
The delivery location is at the Government of Canada Building in Iqaluit, Nunavut.

**Contracting Authority:**
This contract is being administered by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

**Contact Information:**
To inquire, please contact Alex Tikhonovitch at (alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Additional Details:**
